page.title: 02MEDIA IN IGHTHAM
page.content: The{Sevenoaks Chronicle}(our local newspaper) was first published in{1880.}The Sevenoaks Chronicle covers West Malling to Offham to Plaxtol to Hildenborough to Weald to Ide Hill to Westerham to Knockholt to Shoreham to West Kingsdown to Wrotham. The Chronicle is published every Thursday. { The Sevenoaks Chronicle}has a sister paper called{The News in Focus, which comes out on Tuesdays. Another local paper is{The Kent Messenger, which is published every Friday. It covers the whole of Kent so that there is less coverage of our area. That is why The Chronicle is the most popular local paper. The staff at The Chronicle consists of: 1 Editor,1 News Editor, 1 Chief Reporter,1 Sub-Editor,6 reporter 1 Sub-Editor,6 Reporters,3 Photo-
